channel.title: Updates from Nick
channel.description: PR style updates - I can't help it, I'm a communications major

item.title: Working with Ticket Rocket
item.author: Nick Kempinski
item.description: Currently I'm working with Ticket Rocket. A small start up in Victoria, BC. Trying to be good guys in event ticketing.

item.title: This site
item.author: Nick Kempinski
item.description: Under the hood this site is put together with bower, bootstrap, and various other libraries. Additionally I'm playing with a few jquery libraries & a bit of olde school XML.

item.title: Outside of work
item.author: Nick Kempinski
item.description:
When I'm not working, I'm discovering. New Beer, new music, new tech. I tinker and toy with anything media related. Find out more.

The older I get, the more my ludite tendencies show. Oh... I get it. I just sometimes refuse to acknowledge it.

item.title: Launching Orality.ca
item.author: Nick Kempinski
item.description: Today's society is skimming over the real influence of media is having. To explore deeper and to put into context, I have started a new blog, Orality.

item.title: Starting a newsletter
item.author: Nick Kempinski
item.description: I tell everyone that email should not be overlooked. And here I am, knowing this and doing nothing about it. Come on in - sign up.
